response.original_title: One of the things I'm most grateful to Paul for is telling me about the half sunken concrete barges lying in the Thames mud at Rainham, Essex
response.overview: Peter Cusack is one of ninety collaborators that have been commissioned by Matt's Gallery, London, to contribute a film to TAPS: Improvisations with Paul Burwell. Concrete Barges in Rainham was one of the sites Cusack used to record his avant-garde album "Sounds from Dangerous Places," where he recorded the sounds of methane gas escaping the capped landfill just north of the barges.
response.title: One of the things I'm most grateful to Paul for is telling me about the half sunken concrete barges lying in the Thames mud at Rainham, Essex
